about.label: About
about.headline: Building expressive, performant interfaces with intent.
about.body: I partner with teams who care about detail. My craft blends interaction design, modern front-end architecture, and a systems mindset so products scale gracefully as they grow. Whether it is orchestrating a motion language, tuning render pipelines, or leading UI audits, I obsess over the tiny decisions that compound into premium experiences.
about.stackValue: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, Framer Motion
about.focusValue: Design systems, interaction design, DX tooling
about.stats_products_detail: From fintech dashboards to content platforms.
about.stats_velocity_detail: Measured uplift after introducing design systems.
about.stats_coffee_detail: Automations & DX tooling keep the flow uninterrupted.
about.value1_desc: Every layout is choreographed with purposeful motion, subtle depth, and tactile controls that feel responsive to intent.
about.value2_desc: Contrast, focus, keyboard flows, and reduced-motion modes are treated as core features, not nice-to-haves.
about.value3_desc: Budgets, profiling, and bundle visualization are part of the daily workflow to keep experiences fast on any device.
about.ctaBody: I collaborate best when strategy, design, and engineering sit at the same table. If you need an engineer who can shape narratives, architect systems, and sweat the final pixel, I am ready to jump in.
about.timeline1_desc: Lead a distributed squad building multi-tenant dashboards. Owning accessibility, performance budgets, and motion guidelines.
about.timeline2_desc: Shipped internal tooling and public apps with Next.js, GraphQL, and Framer Motion. Built the shared component library adopted by 5 teams.
about.timeline3_desc: Partnered with agencies to translate polished Figma systems into responsive, animated interfaces with TypeScript and Tailwind.

contact.label: Contact
contact.headline: Let's plan the next release together.
contact.body: I work with founders, product squads, and agencies who value interaction quality and predictable delivery. Tell me what you are shipping next and we will map out a collaboration that fits your cadence.
contact.asyncNote: Prefer async? Email works best—I typically respond within one business day.
contact.directEmail_desc: Share a brief about your team, timeline, and goals.
contact.collabDocs_desc: Receive a tailored plan, scope, and pricing sheet.
contact.sendNote_desc: Share as much detail as you can—timeline, deliverables, links to files—and I will follow up with next steps.
contact.formPlaceholderProject: What are you building? What does success look like?
contact.faq1_a: We begin with a discovery call to unpack requirements, constraints, and success metrics. From there, I share a lightweight roadmap plus an initial estimate.
contact.faq2_q: Do you work with existing teams?
contact.faq2_a: Yes. I often plug into design-engineering pods, acting as the front-end lead who shapes the system, reviews PRs, and keeps motion/performance cohesive.
contact.faq3_a: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Framer Motion are my defaults, but I adapt to whatever keeps the experience performant and maintainable.
contact.briefTitle: Have a brief or RFP ready?
contact.briefBody: Send over any documents, prototypes, or Looms. I will review, highlight risks and opportunities, then follow up with a plan you can share with stakeholders.
